Description:
REQUERIMIENTOS:

- Profesional en Ing. en Sistemas computacionales, Ing. de Datos o inteligencia artificial, o carreras afines a la

tecnología de información

- 3 años de experiencia relacionado al análisis comercial, mercado y financiero

- Experiencia demostrable con AWS, Redshift, Athena, S3 y Personalize. Lambda, Step Function, SNS, SQS C. - - en Python y SQL Server.

- Experiencia en modelos de Sistemas de Recomendación y Clustering.

- Maestría Deseable: No indispensable

- Tener experiencia previa trabajando con integración de datos, modelos re regresión lineal, regresión - logística, estadística y modelos probabilísticos.

- Poseer experiencia en el desarrollo de servicios back-end, transformaciones y presentación de datos

- Experiencia Cross Validation, A/B Testing y librerias de Machine Learning para el desarrollo de Modelos Predictivos

- Experiencias en practicas de productibizacion de Modelos de Machine Learning (MLOps)

- Experiencia manejando herramientas de... versionamiento de código (Git,CI/CD)

- Ingles intermedio

CONOCIMIENTOS:

- TensorFlow (Avanzado)

- Pytorch (Intermedio)

- Habilidades numéricas y estadísticas (Intermedio)

Puedes enviar tu CV al correo reclutamiento@talentocentroamerica.com (indicando tu pretensión salarial

Objetivos

Un Ingeniero de Machine Learning es responsable de la creación de modelos y training de sistemas ML. Para hacer este trabajo con éxito, necesita habilidades excepcionales en estadística y programación. También ayudan los conocimientos de ciencia de datos y matemáticas. Su objetivo principal será dar forma y crear aplicaciones eficientes de autoaprendizaje que se integren a nuestras plataformas existentes.

Roles y responsabilidades

Tareas principales:
• Estudiar y transformar datos de la empresa para que sean funcionales en los modelos.
• Diseñar sistemas de machine learning, desde crear el pipeline de datos hasta el resultado final.
• Investigar e implementar algoritmos y herramientas de ML apropiados para diferentes problemas.
• Desarrollar aplicaciones de aprendizaje automático de acuerdo con los requisitos.
• Ampliar las librerías de ML existentes
• Mantenerse al tanto de los desarrollos en el campo

Requisitos de cualificación y formación
• Ing. en Ciencias... Computacionales, Lic. En Matemática
• Entender estructuras de datos, modelación de datos y arquitectura de software
• Conocimiento profundo de matemáticas, probabilidades, estadísticas y algoritmos
• Conocimiento de frameworks y librerías como Scikit-Learn o PySpark
• Poder trabajar en un equipo de desarrolladores

Habilidades excepcionales analíticas y de resolución de problemas

OUR PEOPLE: We deliver positive results and experiences for our partners by first empowering our people. Our industry experts are singularly skilled at what they do and equally adept at bringing their skills together to build solutions stronger than the sum of their parts. Our inclusion and employee-centric focus make for a workplace that provides valuable services and experiences.

THE CROWLEY WAY: Guided by our three values: integrity, sustainability and drive, we believe in and celebrate the power of collaboration between people with diverse backgrounds and experiences to achieve business and personal goals. We support the development of our people and are committed to growing together, inclusively.

SUMMARY: Responsible for designing, developing and identifying data solutions that have direct and measurable impact to the Company’s support operations.

GENERAL RESPONSIBILITIES: Provide data science solutions for business operations by monitoring trends, identifying opportunities... developing and presenting recommendations, implementing the strategies, and measuring the impact. Develop queries and performs extensive programming to access, transform, and prepare data for statistical modeling. Identify and diagnose data inconsistencies and errors, documents data assumptions, and forages to fill data gaps. Develops and implements analytics enabled solutions to improve business process, to generate insights, support business goals and strategy development. Generates relevant, actionable insights based on iterative data analysis, translate data-driven output into business language, and to make appropriate recommendations to respective business stakeholders. Summarize analysis using a wide range of data visualization techniques to determine the types of insights derived from the product and data limitations. Build and maintain effective relationships throughout the organization, fostering communication between internal and external project stakeholders. which influence key decisions across stakeholder groups.

EDUCATION: Bachelor's degree or professional qualification in computer science, data science, mathematics, industrial engineering or a related field. Master’s degree in technical field preferred.

EXPERIENCE: 3+ years relevant work experience in business analysis including market competitiveness, financial analysis, transportation and logistics network optimization. In addition, experience with modeling linear regression, logistic regression, non-parametric statistics, probabilistic modeling and spatial modeling.

TECHNICAL PROFICIENCY: Proficient in Microsoft Office products, including Excel, Outlook, PowerPoint, Word, Access, Visio, SharePoint, Microsoft Projects or similar relational databases. Technical expertise regarding data models, database design development, data mining, SQL query language, report building and segmentation techniques.

COMPETENCIES: Ability to communicate effectively verbally and in writing, including the ability to convey technical information to technical and non-technical users. Ability to establish and maintain effective working relationships. Ability to function effectively with, or as part of a team. Ability to prioritize, organize and perform multiple work assignments simultaneously. Ability to effectively manage projects that may vary in nature and scope. Ability to identify and understand complex problems and review related information to evaluate options and implement solutions. Ability to collect, organize, analyze and disseminate significant amounts of information accurately and with attention to detail. Ability to develop, improve and streamline processes to meet established goals and objectives. Ability to prepare clear and concise reports, policies, procedure, correspondences and other written materials. Knowledge of methods to collect data, research and present. Knowledge of data analysis techniques and methodology.

OTHER: Preferred certifications in Machine Learning & Artificial Intelligence, database management, cloud computing and/or ETL processes.

JOB SCOPE: Position impacts multiple business units/segments.

WORKING CONDITIONS: Normal office environment with little exposure to excessive noise, dust, temperature and the like. Extended use of a computer keyboard, viewing of a computer monitor and the ability to sit for long periods of time.

FLSA STATUS: The position is Exempt. May require the ability to work overtime to meet required deadlines. All work rules, including those that pertain to safety and health, are expected to be respected
